TopicTitle: Space Shuttle Pack for ksp 1.0.4 dev thread

Articles.Content: Yeah there was only trouble with the pitch, so everything fine by now. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

OK guys, this is where the SAS buttons shall be.

(ps don't pay attention to the dashboard panel, not textured yet)

![uc?export=download&id=0B-ALRjYUGKH7WGlMOVRtZnUyMTg](https://drive.google.com/uc?export=download&id=0B-ALRjYUGKH7WGlMOVRtZnUyMTg)
Looks amazing Jeast!

aaaaaaaaawwwwwwwwwwwwwww yeah! glad I have you onboard MATE!

ps I have reworked wings, more functionality and far compatible with built in flaps on the way.

more aerodynamics work for ya...

- - - Updated - - -

doesn't use the funny stock system...
Wow. That IVA is amazing.... can't wait to see it in game!

> 
> OK guys, this is where the SAS buttons shall be....

Why dear GOD have I stopped getting post notifications to this thread????

Amazing work Jeast!

*(posting to renew subscription?!?)*

*Edit: now I see why:*

*Reading back a few pages, you guys would've fried my inbox....lol*

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-14T13:35:43Z" title="06/14/2015 01:35  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 14, 2015</time> by iDisOrder**
Mike I think you should use that new booster from the NASA site. Way more accurate to the shuttle. Plus you can use the nose come on it as it is the correct one. Just my 2 cents

> 
> Mike I think you should use that new booster from the NASA site. Way more accurate to the shuttle. Plus you can use the nose come on it as it is the correct one. Just my 2 cents

Have you used or seen the current boosters in the pack? They are gorgeous and nothing like the ones from the past.

> 
> Have you used or seen the current boosters in the pack? They are gorgeous and nothing like the ones from the past.

I have, they just have extra separation motors on the bell housing that shouldn't be there. Plus, that model will have the correct nose cone.

just wrapping up some loose ends and will upload

need the new aerodynamics on the wings and tail tested (placeholder from another set for now)

tail airbrake needs to be action grouped and I haven't got the cfg right yet

no chute in new tail yet. needs to be modeled in with realchute

Slap an attach node to the lower rear of the tail wing and model a simple casing for the parachute as a separate part. That should do without adding another dependency, imho. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Are the new textures in this update?? Also I like Jovzins SSME texture? could that be used?? (are you two working together now?)

> 
> Slap an attach node to the lower rear of the tail wing and model a simple casing for the parachute as a separate part. That should do without adding another dependency, imho. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Yea i agree. Realchute is not needed for a drag chute. The one we got works just fine IMHO.

sorry just dealing with damn unity again
